---
title: "Deployment and Maintenance"
---

1. The deployment setting are usually different from the development settings. Therefore, different sets of tools are often involved when moving a FFP to production.

2. Deployment may introduce problems that weren't visible during development such as limited computational resources.
    - Use additional time to improve user experience.

3. The quality of data and model performance needs to be monitored consistently to provide stable services to targeted users.
